source.title: Raman quantum memory demonstrates near-unity performance

claim: High-efficiency Raman quantum memory in rubidium vapor implements a physical QA memory cell; Hankel transform maps to QA rotor on torus

concepts.optical_mode: QA ellipse in (t, omega) phase space
concepts.spinwave_compaction: QA ellipse optimization for mode matching

invariants: b + e = d, e + d = a
Optical and spinwave modes share QA ellipse structure

failure_modes.description: QA ellipse of spinwave doesn't match optical mode
